Model¶

The world module¶

Used to represent the world

class world.World(car)¶
The world is composed of :
>>> 1 car
>>> 1 path
>>> 1 current distance traveled
>>> 1 real distance traveled
>>> 1 boolean to reset the disatance
>>> 1 boolean to confirm the reset
ack_reset_distance¶

The boolean to ack the reset distance from the stm32.

Getter:Returns the ack_reset_distance value
Setter:Sets the ack_reset_distance value
Type:boolean
car¶

The object reprenting the car

Getter:Returns the car
Setter:Sets the car
Type:Car
current_distance¶

The current distance traveled by the car. This distance is calculated thanks to the odometry.

Getter:Returns the distance
Setter:Sets the distance
Type:int
path¶

The object path representing current path

Getter:Returns the path
Setter:Sets the path
Type:Path
real_distance¶

The real distance traveled by the car. This distance is the distance managed with the band.

Getter:Returns the distance
Setter:Sets the distance
Type:int
reset_distance¶

The boolean to ask the stm32 to reset the distance.

Getter:Returns the reset_distance value
Setter:Sets the reset_distance value
Type:boolean
set_distance(distance1, distance2)¶

The distance save is the average from the distance of both wheels.

Parameters:
  • distance1 (int) – The distance of the first wheel
  • distance2 (int) – The distance of the second wheel
Setter:

Sets the current distance value
Type:

int

The car module¶

Used to represent the car and its components

class car.Car¶
Little Helper v.1 :
>>> 1 battery
>>> 1 front motor to control the direction
>>> 2 rear motors to move the car
>>> 6 ultrasound sensors to detect obstacles
battery¶

The battery of the car

Getter:Returns the battery object
Setter:Sets the battery object
Type:Battery
direction_motor¶

The direction motor of the car

Getter:Returns the direction_motor object
Setter:Sets the direction_motor object
Type:FrontMotor
moveBackward(speed)¶

Used to transmite the command to move backward to all the motors.

Parameters:speed (int) – The speed of the car
moveForward(speed)¶

Used to transmite the command to move forward to all the motors.

Parameters:speed (int) – The speed of the car
rear_motors¶

The list of the rear motor of the car

Getter:Returns the list of rear_motor object
Setter:Sets the list of rear_motor object
Type:RearMotor[]
sensors¶

The list of the sensors of the car

Getter:Returns the list of sensors object
Setter:Sets the list of sensors object
Type:UltrasoundSensor[]
stop()¶

Used to transmite the command to stop to all the motors.

turn(angle)¶

Used to transmite the command to turn to the direction motor.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (-45..45)
turnLeft(angle)¶

Used to transmite the command to turn left to the direction motor.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (0..45)
turnRight(angle)¶

Used to transmite the command to turn right to the direction motor.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (0..45)

The battery module¶

Used to represent the battery of our car

class battery.Battery¶
charged¶

The state of the battery

Getter:Returns the state of the battery
Setter:Sets the state of the battery
Type:Boolean

The motor module¶

Used to handle the behaviours of motors on the car.

class motor.FrontMotor¶

Used to represent the front motor to control the direction of the car

Caracteristics :
>>> an angle to turn
angle¶

The angle to turn

Getter:Returns the angle
Setter:Sets the angle
Type:int
turn(angle)¶

Used to set the angle for turning.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (-45..45)
turnLeft(angle)¶

Used to set the angle for turning to the left.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (0..45)
turnRight(angle)¶

Used to set the angle for turning to the right.

Parameters:angle – The angle to turn (0..45)
class motor.RearMotor¶

Used to represent the rear motor to control the speed of the car

Caracteristics :
>>> a speed
moveBackward(speed)¶

Used to set the speedfor moving backward.

Parameters:speed (int) – The speed of the car
moveForward(speed)¶

Used to set the speed for moving forward.

Parameters:speed (int) – The speed of the car
speed¶

The speed of the car

Getter:Returns the speed
Setter:Sets the speed
Type:int
stop()¶

Used to stop the car ie set the speed to 0

The sensor module¶

Used to handle the behaviour of sensors on the car.

class sensor.UltrasoundSensor(name)¶

Used to represente the ultrasound sensors of the car.

Caracteristics :
>>> a distance
>>> a name
distance¶

The distance catch by the sensor

Getter:Returns the distance
Setter:Sets the distance
Type:int
name¶

The name of the sensor

Getter:Returns the name of the sensor
Setter:Sets the name of the sensor
Type:str

The path module¶

Used to represent the path

class path.Path¶

Used to manage the current path followed by the car

Caracteristics :
>>> a list of instructions
add_instruction(instruction)¶

Used to add an instruction to the path. The instruction is add at the end of the path.

Parameters:instruction (Instruction) – The instruction to add
del_first_instruction()¶

Used to delete the first instruction of the list of instruction

get_current_instruction()¶

The current instruction of the path

Getter:Returns the first element of the list of instructions
Type:Instruction
get_path()¶

The path of the car

Getter:Returns the list of instructions
Type:Instruction[]
class path.Paths¶

Used to build and save the differents path available.

Caracteristics :
>>> a list of paths
build_paths()¶

Create the differents paths of the car and save them in the list of paths.

get_path(index)¶

Return the path corresponding to the index.

Parameters:index (int) – The index of the path asked
Getter:Returns the path corresponding to the index number
Type:Path

The instruction module¶

Used to represent the instructions the car is going to execute when going from point A to B

class instructions.Instruction(action, speed=0, distance=0, sleep_time=0)¶
Caracteristics :
>>> an action to execute
>>> specification
action¶

The action of the instruction

Getter:Returns the action of the instruction
Setter:Sets the action of the instruction
Type:FORWARD, BACKWARD, STOP, TURN_LEFT, TURN_RIGHT
distance¶

The distance of the instruction

Getter:Returns the distance of the instruction
Setter:Sets the distance of the instruction
Type:int
sleep_time¶

The time to sleep (to stop the car)

Getter:Returns the time to sleep
Setter:Sets the time to sleep
Type:int
speed¶

The speed of the instruction

Getter:Returns the speed of the instruction
Setter:Sets the speed of the instruction
Type:int
